title: Looking For teams to scrims against my Team HNP Pref Diamond Ello :) also looking for a Jgler,
body: Heya, Add My IGN Silkenfawn Flick me a message and sort out some scrims :) Our Average ello is D5/D4 we have a couple of teams who are Thirsty for more Scrims :) were a OOL team, Also a Friend of mine is looking for a Jgler for his Plat + team message me about that if interested to :)

replies.body: Hey guys I am a plat 2 smurf, jungler main, would love to join a team and try get myself out there and learn more to become a great lol player. I have the dedication and a huge champion pool.
Manager of Nurse E-Sports, T1 and T2. If you wanna scrim against another OOL team with diamond only contact me.
